text: The Mule is a 2018 American crime drama movie produced and directed by Clint Eastwood. It is based on the story of Leo Sharp, a World War II veteran who became a drug courier for the Sinaloa Cartel in his 80s. The movie also stars Bradley Cooper, Laurence Fishburne, Michael Peña, Dianne Wiest, and Andy García. The Mule was released in the United States on December 14, 2018, by Warner Bros. to strong positive reviews. ==References== Category:2018 crime movies Category:2018 drama movies Category:2010s crime drama movies Category:2010s American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about families
title: The Mule (2018 movie)
